text: Ke kaloku abo bangakholwayo bathi: “Asisokuze sikholwe kule ‘Kur’ân singasokuze (sikholwe) nakuloo (Ncwadi ingaphambili kunayo.” Kodwa ukuba ubunokubabona abenzi bobubi xa beya kumiswa phambi kweNkosi yabo, bephikisana iintetho zabo. Abo babecinezelekile baya kuthi kwabo babekhukhumele: “Ukuba kwakungekho ngenxa yenu ngesasibe ngamakholwa (amaMuslim)!”
